h2_title: Nine-Capped Lingzhi Guai Boss Fight and Guide
content: Though these are fairly standard attacks, in the sense that they can be dodged and evaded, the problem with them is the small red mushrooms that appear with each one.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Nine-Capped_Lingzhi_Guai.md', within the main section titled 'Nine-Capped Lingzhi Guai', specifically from the subsection 'Nine-Capped Lingzhi Guai Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Though these are fairly standard attacks, in the sense that they can be dodged and evaded, the problem with them is the small red mushrooms that appear with each one.
